Package com.tranquyet.util.excel

Class BarChartExcel

java.lang.Object
com.tranquyet.util.excel.graph.BarChartExcel
public class BarChartExcel extends Object
BarChartExcel will create a bar chart base the table which uses to count the number of student having the same year of birth

    • createGraph

      public static void createGraph​(org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFSheet chartSheet, int sizeMap, org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook workbook)
      create a bar chart to describe the count year table previously
      Parameters:
      chartSheet - create Chart Sheet
      sizeMap - a dynamic variable to expand the width of chart and border when sizeMap increase then the width of chart and border will increase a quantity respectively

    • createCountYearTable

      public static void createCountYearTable​(org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook workbook, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Sheet chartSheet, Map<Integer,​Long> mapSameAge, int sizeMap)
      create a table which distinguish the same year of birth of student
      Parameters:
      workbook - representation of an Excel workbook
      chartSheet - create Chart Sheet
      mapSameAge - a set of data which comprise key - unique year and value - the number of student having the same year
      sizeMap - a dynamic variable to expand the width of chart and border when sizeMap increase then the width of chart and border will increase a quantity respectively
